plot: True story of a man who believes God owns the earth and land cannot be owned by anyone, therefore he's at liberty to build his church on ground occupied by others.
title: The Native Who Caused All the Trouble
plot_es: True story of a man who believes God owns the earth and land cannot be owned by anyone, therefore he's at liberty to build his church on ground occupied by others.
original_name: The Native Who Caused All the Trouble
